Text: who the fuck RAR's a 175mb file?

Video kept skipping and sound kept cutting out.  Shitty upload.  I would've downloaded one of the other ones but they have no seeds, sadly.

Also gotta agree with the other comment on the stupidity of torrenting a bunch of rar files, especially on such a small video upload.

How retarded do you have to be to, first of all, compress an already heavily compressed video file and then secondly into a bunch of small files?

It's completely unnecessary! If you don't understand it already: The file is already as compressed as it can get and the torrent technology already makes sure to split the download into way smaller parts and from a lot of people, hence the name "Torrent".
who is 'rar'ing these files?  so dumb. soooo fucking dumb.
